name: Lost at the Disco
description:
Made by team: SmolSkitties.

You find yourself working hard to earn some money in this post apocalyptic wasteland. 
After the events that made the world fall apart, nature has taken over again and it's beginning to rebuild what was lost.
One such way is a massive CLUB PARTY deep in the depths of the ocean.
However, animals are terrible at keeping their items close to them and they easily get lost. It's your job (and this is what gets you paid) to retrieve the correct items to the correct customers. Mistake will cost you time and maybe even money. So pay close attention to their descriptions!

Soundtrack:
https://soundcloud.com/thymo-boog/sets/party-songs-for-party-animals
